author: duncan
msg: Hack fix to bring in line with DOM2 REC. I'm not sure where the extra
method went off to, but I don't seem to suffer from taking it out.
NOTE: This change was prompted because the build was effectively broken
when compiling the whole source tree. I'm shifting my bootstrap for Ant
to compile out of the xml-crimson workspace directly, thereby minimizing
dependencies on jars. But, this exposed this break.
